duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute real-world evidence strategies for drug projects at a global level.
Provide specialist guidance to medical indication leads, senior leaders, and cross-functional team members.
Lead the development of consensus among scientific and business experts to ensure scientific quality and timely, cost-effective project delivery.
Support Global Medical Affairs needs through epidemiology & real-world evidence (RWE) and effectiveness data for a given brand/s.
Work independently and with other medical staff in the design, execution, analysis, interpretation, and communication of epidemiological/outcomes research studies.

education_certification.credential: PhD in pharmacoepidemiology or a closely related field (e.g. PharmD PhD or M.D.) with comprehensive knowledge of clinical and commercial drug development processes. An MPH is desired but not required.
